channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Manufacturing Execution
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Manufacturing Execution

item.title: CVE-2022-39802|2024-08-03T12:07:42.684Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20manufacturing%20execution
item.description: SAP Manufacturing Execution - versions 15.1, 15.2, 15.3, allows an attacker to exploit insufficient validation of a file path request parameter. The intended file path can be manipulated to allow arbitrary traversal of directories on the remote server. The file content within each directory can be read which may lead to information disclosure.
